package com.shgxy.servlet;import javax.servlet.ServletException;import javax.servlet.ServletOutputStream;import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;import java.io.FileInputStream;import java.io.FileOutputStream;import java.io.IOException;import java.net.URLEncoder;public class FileServlet extends HttpServlet {    @Override    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {//        - è¦è·å–æ–‡ä»¶çš„è·¯å¾„ï¼›        String realPath = "D:\\Code\\javaCodeP\\javaweb-02-servlet\\response\\src\\main\\resources\\flower.png";        System.out.println("æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½è·¯å¾„ï¼š"+realPath);//        - ä¸‹è½½çš„æ–‡ä»¶åï¼›        String fileName = realPath.substring(realPath.lastIndexOf("\\") + 1);//        - æƒ³åŠæ³•è®©æµè§ˆå™¨æ”¯æŒä¸‹è½½æƒ³ä¸‹è½½çš„ä¸œè¥¿ï¼›        resp.setHeader("Content-disposition","attachment;filename"+ URLEncoder.encode(fileName,"UTF-8"));//        - è·å–ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶çš„è¾“å…¥æµï¼›        FileInputStream in = new FileInputStream(realPath);//        - åˆ›å»ºç¼“å†²åŒºåŸŸï¼›        int len = 0;        byte[] bytes = new byte[1024];//        - è·å–OutputStreamå¯¹è±¡ï¼›        ServletOutputStream out = resp.getOutputStream();//        - å°†FileOutputStreamæµå†™å…¥åˆ°bufferç¼“å†²åŒºï¼›ä½¿ç”¨OutputStreamå°†ç¼“å†²åŒºä¸­çš„æ•°æ®è¾“å‡ºåˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼›        while((len=in.read(bytes))>0){            out.write(bytes,0,len);        }        in.close();        out.close();    }    @Override    protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {    }}

package com.shgxy.servlet;import javax.imageio.ImageIO;import javax.servlet.ServletException;import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;import java.io.IOException;import java.util.Random;public class ImageServlet extends HttpServlet {    @Override    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {        //æµè§ˆå™¨3såˆ·æ–°ä¸€æ¬¡        resp.setHeader("refresh","3");        //åœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡        BufferedImage image = new BufferedImage(80,20,BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB);        //å¾—åˆ°å›¾ç‰‡        Graphics2D g = (Graphics2D)image.getGraphics();//ç”»ç¬”        g.setBackground(Color.pink);        g.fillRect(0,0,80,20);        //ç»™å›¾ç‰‡å†™æ•°æ®        g.setColor(Color.BLUE);        g.setFont(new Font(null,Font.BOLD,20));        g.drawString(makeNum(),0,20);        //å‘Šè¯‰æµè§ˆå™¨ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚ç”¨å›¾ç‰‡çš„æ–¹å¼æ‰“å¼€        resp.setContentType("image/jpeg");        //ç½‘ç«™å­˜åœ¨ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œä¸è®©æµè§ˆå™¨ç¼“å­˜        resp.setDateHeader("expries",-1);        resp.setHeader("Cache-Control","no-cache");        resp.setHeader("program","no-cache");        //æŠŠå›¾ç‰‡å†™ç»™æµè§ˆå™¨        ImageIO.write(image,"jpg",resp.getOutputStream());    }    //ç”Ÿæˆéšæœºæ•°    private String makeNum(){        Random random = new Random();        java.lang.String num = random.nextInt(999999)+"";        StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();        for (int i = 0; i < 6-num.length(); i++) {            sb.append("0");        }        num = sb.toString()+num;        return num;    }    @Override    protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServletException, IOException {    }}

package com.shgxy.reflection;import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;import java.lang.reflect.Method;public class Test10 {    //æ™®é€šæ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨    public static void test1(){        User user = new User();        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();        for (int i = 0; i < 1000_000_000; i++) {            user.getId();        }        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();        System.out.println("æ™®é€šæ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨ï¼š"+(endTime-startTime)+"ms");    }    //åå°„æ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨    public static void test2() throws NoSuchMethodException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException {        User user = new User();        Class c1 = user.getClass();        Method getId = c1.getDeclaredMethod("getId",null);        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();        for (int i = 0; i < 1000_000_000; i++) {            getId.invoke(user,null);        }        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();        System.out.println("åå°„æ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨ï¼š"+(endTime-startTime)+"ms");    }    //åå°„æ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨ å…³é—­æ£€æµ‹setAccessible(true)    public static void test3() throws NoSuchMethodException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException {        User user = new User();        Class c1 = user.getClass();        Method getId = c1.getDeclaredMethod("getId",null);        getId.setAccessible(true);        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();        for (int i = 0; i < 1000_000_000; i++) {            getId.invoke(user,null);        }        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();        System.out.println("å…³é—­æ£€æµ‹æ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨ï¼š"+(endTime-startTime)+"ms");    }    public static void main(String[] args) throws NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException {        test1();        test2();        test3();    }}/*è¾“å‡ºï¼š* æ™®é€šæ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨ï¼š3ms* åå°„æ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨ï¼š1814ms* å…³é—­æ£€æµ‹æ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨ï¼š1243ms* */

public class Test11 {    public void test01(Map<String,User> map, List<User> list){        System.out.println("test01");    }    public Map<String,User> test02(){        System.out.println("test02");        return null;    }    public static void main(String[] args) throws NoSuchMethodException {        Method method = Test11.class.getMethod("test01", Map.class, List.class);        for (Type genericParameterType : method.getGenericParameterTypes()) {//            System.out.println(genericParameterType);            if(genericParameterType instanceof ParameterizedType){                Type[] actualTypeArguments = ((ParameterizedType) genericParameterType).getActualTypeArguments();                for (Type actualTypeArgument : actualTypeArguments) {                    System.out.println(actualTypeArgument);                }            }        }        //è·å–è¿”å›å€¼ä¿¡æ¯        Method method2 = Test11.class.getMethod("test02",null);        Type genericReturnType = method2.getGenericReturnType();        if(genericReturnType instanceof ParameterizedType){            Type[] actualTypeArguments = ((ParameterizedType) genericReturnType).getActualTypeArguments();            for (Type actualTypeArgument : actualTypeArguments) {                System.out.println(actualTypeArgument);            }        }    }}

package com.shgxy.reflection;import java.lang.annotation.*;public class Test12 {    public static void main(String[] args) throws ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchFieldException {        Class c1 = Class.forName("com.shgxy.reflection.Student2");                //é€šè¿‡åå°„è·å¾—æ³¨è§£        Annotation[] annotations = c1.getAnnotations();        for (Annotation annotation : annotations) {            System.out.println(annotation);        }        //è·å¾—æ³¨è§£çš„valueå€¼        TableGod tableGod = (TableGod)c1.getAnnotation(TableGod.class);        String value = tableGod.value();        System.out.println(value);        //è·å¾—ç±»æŒ‡å®šçš„æ³¨è§£        java.lang.reflect.Field f = c1.getDeclaredField("id");        Field annotation = f.getAnnotation(Field.class);        System.out.println(annotation.columnName());        System.out.println(annotation.type());        System.out.println(annotation.length());    }}@TableGod("db_student")class Student2{    @Field(columnName = "db_id",type = "int",length = 10)    private int id;    @Field(columnName = "db_age",type = "int",length = 10)    private int age;    @Field(columnName = "db_name",type = "varchar",length = 10)    private String name;    public Student2(){}    public Student2(int id, int age, String name) {        this.id = id;        this.age = age;        this.name = name;    }    public int getId() {        return id;    }    public void setId(int id) {        this.id = id;    }    public int getAge() {        return age;    }    public void setAge(int age) {        this.age = age;    }    public String getName() {        return name;    }    public void setName(String name) {        this.name = name;    }    @Override    public String toString() {        return "Student2{" +                "id=" + id +                ", age=" + age +                ", name='" + name + '\'' +                '}';    }}//ç±»åæ³¨è§£@Target(ElementType.TYPE)@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)@interface TableGod{    String value();}//å±æ€§æ³¨è§£@Target(ElementType.FIELD)@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)@interface Field{    String columnName();    String type();    int length();}

package com.shgxy.thread01;public class Race implements Runnable{private static String winner;    @Override    public void run() {        for (int i = 0; i <= 100; i++) {            //æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå…”å­ä¼‘æ¯            if (Thread.currentThread().getName().equals("å…”å­") && i%10==0){                try {                    Thread.sleep(1);                } catch (InterruptedException e) {                    e.printStackTrace();                }            }            //åˆ¤æ–­æ¯”èµ›æ˜¯å¦ç»“æŸ            boolean flag = gameOver(i);            //æ¯”èµ›ç»“æŸç»ˆæ­¢ç¨‹åº            if (flag){                break;            }            System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName()+":èµ°äº†"+i+"æ­¥");        }    }    private boolean gameOver(int step){        //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦èƒœåˆ©        if (winner!=null){            return true;        }        {            if (step>=100){            winner = Thread.currentThread().getName();            System.out.println("èƒœåˆ©è€…ï¼š"+winner);            return true;        }        }        return false;    }    public static void main(String[] args) {        Race race = new Race();        new Thread(race,"å…”å­").start();        new Thread(race,"ä¹Œé¾Ÿ").start();    }}

package com.shgxy.Poxy;public class StaticPoxy {    public static void main(String[] args) {        You you = new You();        jhCo jhCo = new jhCo(you);        jhCo.HappyMarry();    }}interface Marry{    void HappyMarry();}class You implements Marry{    @Override    public void HappyMarry() {        System.out.println("å…´é«˜é‡‡çƒˆè¿›å¤§å‚");    }}//ä»£ç†ï¼Œå¸®ä½  Marryclass jhCo implements Marry{    private Marry girl;    public jhCo(Marry girl) {        this.girl = girl;            }    @Override    public void HappyMarry() {        before();        this.girl.HappyMarry();        after();    }    private void after() {        System.out.println("å¸¦è–ªæ‹‰ç¿”è¢«å¼€é™¤");    }    private void before() {        System.out.println("æ¥åˆ°offerï¼Œè¶…å¼€å¿ƒ");    }}

  • å»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡å¿—ä½è¿›è¡Œç»ˆæ­¢å˜é‡ï¼ˆflag=falseï¼Œç»ˆæ­¢çº¿ç¨‹è¿è¡Œï¼‰ã€‚
public class TestStop implements Runnable{    //  æ ‡å¿—ä½    private boolean flag = true;    @Override    public void run() {        int t = 0;        while (flag){            System.out.println("run-------Thread"+t++);        }    }    public void stop(){        this.flag = false;    }    public static void main(String[] args) {        TestStop testStop = new TestStop();        new Thread(testStop).start();        for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {            System.out.println("main: "+i);            if (i==900){                testStop.stop();                System.out.println("stop~~");                break;            }        }    }}

çº¿ç¨‹ä¼‘çœ 

  • sleep(æ—¶é—´) æŒ‡å®šçº¿ç¨‹é˜»å¡çš„æ¯«ç§’æ•°ï¼›

public class TestSleep{    public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {        Date date = new Date(System.currentTimeMillis());        while (true){            Thread.sleep(1000);            System.out.println(new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm:ss").format(date));            date = new Date(System.currentTimeMillis());        }    }}

public class TestYield {    public static void main(String[] args) {        MyYield yield = new MyYield();        new Thread(yield,"sxy").start();        new Thread(yield,"syx").start();    }}class MyYield implements Runnable{    @Override    public void run() {        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName()+" - threadStart");        Thread.yield();        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName()+" - threadEnd");    }}

package com.shgxy.state;public class TestJoin implements Runnable{    public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {        TestJoin join = new TestJoin();        Thread thread = new Thread(join);        thread.start();        //ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹        for (int i = 0; i < 500; i++) {            if (i==200){                thread.join();            }            System.out.println("mainï¼š"+i);        }    }    @Override    public void run() {        for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {            System.out.println("vipï¼š"+i+" å·ç”¨æˆ·æ¥äº†");        }    }}

çº¿ç¨‹çŠ¶æ€è§‚æµ‹

new -> runnable -> blocked -> waiting -> dead

public static enum Thread.State    extends Enum<Thread.State>

äº”ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€ï¼š

  • RUNNABLE

  • BLOCKED

  • WAITING

  • TIMED_WAITING

  • TERMINATED

ğŸ¥‡ æ­»äº¡åçš„çº¿ç¨‹ä¸èƒ½å†æ¬¡å¯åŠ¨ï¼Œå³ä¸èƒ½åœ¨è¿è¡Œè¯¥è¯­å¥ï¼šthread.start()

public class TestState {    public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {        Thread thread = new Thread(()->{            for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {                try {                    Thread.sleep(1000);                } catch (InterruptedException e) {                    e.printStackTrace();                }            }            System.out.println("////////");        });        //è§‚å¯ŸçŠ¶æ€        Thread.State state = thread.getState();        System.out.println(state);//NEW        //è§‚å¯Ÿå¯åŠ¨å        thread.start();//å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹        state = thread.getState();        System.out.println(state);//RUNNABLE        while (state!=Thread.State.TERMINATED){            Thread.sleep(100);            state = thread.getState();//æ›´æ–°çº¿ç¨‹çŠ¶æ€            System.out.println(state);//è¾“å‡ºçŠ¶æ€        }        //thread.start();//æ— æ³•å†æ¬¡å¯åŠ¨    }}

çº¿ç¨‹ä¼˜å…ˆçº§

  • ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ç”¨æ•°å­—è¡¨ç¤ºï¼ŒèŒƒå›´ï¼š1~10

    • ```java

      - ä½¿ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹å¼æ”¹å˜æˆ–è€…è·å–ä¼˜å…ˆçº§  - getPriority().setPriority(int newPriority)> ä¼˜å…ˆçº§è¶Šé«˜åªæ˜¯è¯´æ˜è¢«ä¼˜å…ˆè°ƒç”¨çš„æ¦‚ç‡è¶Šå¤§ï¼Œä¼˜å…ˆçº§è¶Šä½åŒç†ã€‚```javat1.start();//å…ˆè®¾ç½®ä¼˜å…ˆçº§å†å¯åŠ¨        t2.setPriority(Thread.MIN_PRIORITY);t2.start();        t3.setPriority(4); t3.start();        t4.setPriority(Thread.MAX_PRIORITY);t4.start();        t5.setPriority(9); t5.start();        t6.setPriority(3); t6.start();

public class TestPC {    public static void main(String[] args) {        SynContainer synContainer = new SynContainer();        new Producer(synContainer).start();        new Consumer(synContainer).start();    }}//------------------------------------------------------//ç”Ÿäº§è€…class Producer extends Thread{    SynContainer container;    public Producer(SynContainer container) {        this.container = container;    }    //ç”Ÿäº§    @Override    public void run() {        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {            System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§æ•°ï¼š" + i+ " åª");            container.push(new Chicken(i));        }    }}//------------------------------------------------------//æ¶ˆè´¹è€…class Consumer extends Thread{    SynContainer container;    public Consumer(SynContainer container) {        this.container = container;    }    @Override    public void run() {        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {            System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹äº†ï¼š" + container.pop().id + " åªé¸¡");        }    }}//------------------------------------------------------//äº§å“class Chicken{    int id;//äº§å“ç¼–å·    public Chicken(int id) {        this.id = id;    }}//------------------------------------------------------//ç¼“å†²åŒºclass SynContainer {    //éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªå®¹å™¨å¤§å°    Chicken[] chickens = new Chicken[10];    int count = 0;    //--------------------------------------------------    //ç”Ÿäº§è€…æ”¾å…¥äº§å“    public synchronized void push(Chicken chicken){        //å¦‚æœå®¹å™¨æ»¡äº†ï¼Œç­‰å¾…æ¶ˆè´¹        if (count==chickens.length){            //é€šçŸ¥æ¶ˆè´¹è€…æ¶ˆè´¹ï¼Œç”Ÿäº§è€…ç­‰å¾…            try {                this.wait();            } catch (InterruptedException e) {                e.printStackTrace();            }        }        //æ²¡æ»¡ï¼Œæ”¾å…¥äº§å“        chickens[count] = chicken;        count++;        //é€šçŸ¥æ¶ˆè´¹è€…æ¶ˆè´¹        this.notifyAll();    }//--------------------------------------------------    //æ¶ˆè´¹è€…æ¶ˆè´¹äº§å“    public synchronized Chicken pop(){        //åˆ¤æ–­èƒ½å¦æ¶ˆè´¹        if (count==0){            //ç­‰å¾…ç”Ÿäº§è€…ç”Ÿäº§ï¼Œæ¶ˆè´¹è€…ç­‰å¾…            try {                this.wait();            } catch (InterruptedException e) {                e.printStackTrace();            }        }        //å¯ä»¥æ¶ˆè´¹ï¼Œåˆ™æ¶ˆè´¹        count--;        Chicken product = chickens[count];        //æ¶ˆè´¹ä¹‹åé€šçŸ¥ç”Ÿäº§è€…ç”Ÿäº§        this.notifyAll();        return product;    }}

//æµ‹è¯•çº¿ç¨‹æ± public class TestPool {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹æ±         //newFixedThreadPoolï¼Œå‚æ•°ä¸ºï¼šçº¿ç¨‹æ± å¤§å°        ExecutorService service = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(10);        //æ‰§è¡Œ        service.execute(new MyThread());        service.execute(new MyThread());        service.execute(new MyThread());        service.execute(new MyThread());        //å…³é—­è¿æ¥        service.shutdown();    }}class MyThread implements Runnable{    @Override    public void run() {        System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName());    }}

package com.shgxy.less02;import java.io.*;import java.net.ServerSocket;import java.net.Socket;public class TestServerDemo02 {    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {        //åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡        ServerSocket serversocket = new ServerSocket(9999);        //ç›‘å¬å®¢æˆ·ç«¯        Socket accept = serversocket.accept();        //è·å–è¾“å…¥æµ        InputStream is = accept.getInputStream();        //æ–‡ä»¶è¾“å‡º        FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(new File("re.png"));        byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];        int len;        boolean receive=false;        while((len=is.read(buffer))!=-1){            fos.write(buffer,0,len);            receive=!receive;        }        //é€šçŸ¥å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ”¶åˆ°äº†        if (receive==true){            receive=false;            OutputStream os = accept.getOutputStream();            os.write("Serveræ¥æ”¶å®Œæ¯•".getBytes());        }        //å…³é—­èµ„æº        fos.close();        is.close();        accept.close();        serversocket.close();    }}

package com.shgxy.study01;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;public class Prac {    public static void main(String[] args) {        Frame frame   = new Frame();        frame.setVisible(true);        frame.setSize(400,300);        frame.setLocation(300,400);        frame.setBackground(Color.white);        //      |-|        frame.setLayout(new GridLayout(2,1));        //  4ä¸ªé¢æ¿        Panel panel_1 = new Panel(new BorderLayout());        Panel panel_2 = new Panel(new GridLayout(2,1));        Panel panel_3 = new Panel(new BorderLayout());        Panel panel_4 = new Panel(new GridLayout(2,1));        //  ä¸Šé¢å¸ƒå±€        panel_1.add(new Button("East-1"),BorderLayout.EAST);        panel_1.add(new Button("West-1"),BorderLayout.WEST);        panel_2.add(new Button("p2-1"));        panel_2.add(new Button("p2-2"));        panel_1.add(panel_2,BorderLayout.CENTER);        //  ä¸‹é¢å¸ƒå±€        panel_3.add(new Button("East-2"),BorderLayout.EAST);        panel_3.add(new Button("West-2"),BorderLayout.WEST);        //  ä¸‹é¢ä¸­é—´å¸ƒå±€        for (int i = 1; i < 5; i++) {            panel_4.add(new Button("for-"+i));        }        panel_3.add(panel_4,BorderLayout.CENTER);        frame.add(panel_1);        frame.add(panel_3);                frame.addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {            @Override            public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {                System.exit(0);            }        });    }}

package com.shgxy.study02;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;import java.awt.event.ActionListener;import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;public class TestActionEvent {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //  æŒ‰ä¸‹æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œè§¦å‘ä¸€äº›äº‹ä»¶        Button button = new Button();        Frame frame = new Frame();        //   addActionListener()éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªActionListenerï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ„é€ ä¸€ä¸ªActionListenerï¼ˆç»§æ‰¿ï¼‰        MyActionListener myActionListener = new MyActionListener();        button.addActionListener(myActionListener);        frame.add(button,BorderLayout.CENTER);        frame.pack();        frame.setVisible(true);        windowClose(frame);    }    //  å…³é—­çª—ä½“äº‹ä»¶    public static void windowClose(Frame frame){        frame.addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {            @Override            public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {                System.exit(0);            }        });    }}//  äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬class MyActionListener implements ActionListener{    @Override    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {        System.out.println("button");    }}
package com.shgxy.study02;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;import java.awt.event.ActionListener;public class TestActionTwo {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //  ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‰é’®ï¼Œå®ç°åŒä¸€ä¸ªç›‘å¬        Frame frame = new Frame();        Button btn_start = new Button("start");        Button btn_stop = new Button("stop");        //   å¯ä»¥æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„å®šä¹‰è§¦å‘ä¼šè¿”å›çš„å‘½ä»¤ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸æ˜¾ç¤ºå®šä¹‰ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›é»˜è®¤å€¼        //  å¯ä»¥å¤šä¸ªæŒ‰é’®åªå†™ä¸€ä¸ªç›‘å¬ç±»        btn_stop.setActionCommand("btn_stop");        MyMonitor myMonitor = new MyMonitor();        btn_start.addActionListener(myMonitor);        btn_stop.addActionListener(myMonitor);        frame.add(btn_start,BorderLayout.NORTH);        frame.add(btn_stop,BorderLayout.SOUTH);        frame.pack();        frame.setVisible(true);    }}class MyMonitor implements ActionListener{    @Override    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {        //   è·å–æŒ‰é’®çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è—‰æ­¤ä½œä¸ºåˆ¤æ–­è¯­å¥        System.out.println("æŒ‰é’®è¢«ç‚¹å‡»äº†ï¼šmsg=> "+e.getActionCommand());    }}

package com.shgxy.study02;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;import java.awt.event.ActionListener;public class TestText01 {    public static void main(String[] args) {        new MyFrame();    }}class MyFrame extends Frame{    public MyFrame(){        //  new TextArea(); ç”¨äºå†™å¤šè¡Œæ–‡æœ¬        //  new TextField();ç”¨äºå•è¡Œæ–‡æœ¬        TextField textField = new TextField();        add(textField);        //  ç›‘å¬è¯¥æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†è¾“å…¥çš„æ–‡å­—        MyActionListener1 myActionListener1 = new MyActionListener1();        //  æŒ‰ä¸‹Enterï¼Œå°±ä¼šè§¦å‘è¯¥è¾“å…¥æ¡†äº‹ä»¶        textField.addActionListener(myActionListener1);        //  è®¾ç½®æ›¿æ¢ç¼–ç         textField.setEchoChar('*');        pack();        setVisible(true);    }}class MyActionListener1 implements ActionListener {    @Override    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {        TextField field = (TextField) e.getSource();//è·å¾—ä¸€äº›èµ„æº        System.out.println(field.getText());//è·å¾—è¾“å…¥æ¡†çš„æ–‡æœ¬å¹¶è¾“å‡º        field.setText("");//nullï¼Œè·å–è¾“å…¥åå›è½¦æ¸…ç©º    }}

package com.shgxy.study02;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;import java.awt.event.ActionListener;//ç®€æ˜“è®¡ç®—å™¨public class TestCalc {    public static void main(String[] args) {        new Calculator();    }}//è®¡ç®—å™¨ç±»class  Calculator extends Frame{    public Calculator() {        //  3ä¸ª  æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†        TextField num_1 = new TextField(10);        //10ä»£è¡¨æœ€å¤šå†™10ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦        TextField num_2 = new TextField(10);        TextField sum = new TextField(20);        //  1ä¸ª  æŒ‰é’®        Button button = new Button("=");        button.addActionListener(new MyActionListener2(num_1,num_2,sum));                //  1ä¸ª  æ ‡ç­¾        Label label = new Label("+");        //  å¸ƒå±€        setLayout(new FlowLayout());        add(num_1);        add(label);        add(num_2);        add(button);        add(sum);        pack();        setVisible(true);    }}//ç›‘å¬å™¨ç±»class MyActionListener2 implements ActionListener{    //  è·å–ä¸‰ä¸ªå˜é‡    private TextField num_1,num_2,num_3;    public MyActionListener2(TextField num_1,TextField num_2,TextField num_3) {        this.num_1 = num_1;        this.num_2 = num_2;        this.num_3 = num_3;    }    @Override    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {        //  è·å–ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°        num_1.getText();// Stringç±»å‹        int n1 = Integer.parseInt(num_1.getText());// String è½¬ int ç±»å‹        int n2 = Integer.parseInt(num_2.getText());                //  è¿›è¡Œ+è¿ç®—ï¼Œæ”¾å…¥sumæ¡†        int s = n1 + n2;        num_3.setText(""+s);        //  æ¸…é™¤å‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¡†        num_1.setText("");        num_2.setText("");    }}

package com.shgxy.study02;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;import java.awt.event.ActionListener;//ç®€æ˜“è®¡ç®—å™¨public class TestCalc {    public static void main(String[] args) {        new Calculator().loadFrame();    }}//è®¡ç®—å™¨ç±»class  Calculator extends Frame{    //  å±æ€§    TextField num_1,num_2,sum;    //  æ–¹æ³•    public void loadFrame(){        //  3ä¸ª  æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†        num_1 = new TextField(10);        //10ä»£è¡¨æœ€å¤šå†™10ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦        num_2 = new TextField(10);        sum = new TextField(20);        //  1ä¸ª  æŒ‰é’®        Button button = new Button("=");        button.addActionListener(new MyActionListener2(this));        //  1ä¸ª  æ ‡ç­¾        Label label = new Label("+");        //  å¸ƒå±€        setLayout(new FlowLayout());        add(num_1);        add(label);        add(num_2);        add(button);        add(sum);        pack();        setVisible(true);    }    public Calculator() {    }}//ç›‘å¬å™¨ç±»class MyActionListener2 implements ActionListener{    //  è·å–ä¸‰ä¸ªå˜é‡    Calculator calculator = null;    public MyActionListener2(Calculator calculator) {        this.calculator = calculator;    }    @Override    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {        //  è·å–ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°        //  calculator.num_1.getText();// Stringç±»å‹        int n1 = Integer.parseInt(calculator.num_1.getText());// String è½¬ int ç±»å‹        int n2 = Integer.parseInt(calculator.num_2.getText());        //  è¿›è¡Œ+è¿ç®—ï¼Œæ”¾å…¥sumæ¡†        int s = n1 + n2;        calculator.sum.setText(""+s);        //  æ¸…é™¤å‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¡†        calculator.num_1.setText("");        calculator.num_2.setText("");    }}

package com.shgxy.study02;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;import java.awt.event.ActionListener;//ç®€æ˜“è®¡ç®—å™¨public class TestCalc {    public static void main(String[] args) {        new Calculator().loadFrame();    }}//è®¡ç®—å™¨ç±»class  Calculator extends Frame{    //  å±æ€§    TextField num_1,num_2,sum;    //  æ–¹æ³•    public void loadFrame(){        //  3ä¸ª  æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†        num_1 = new TextField(10);        //10ä»£è¡¨æœ€å¤šå†™10ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦        num_2 = new TextField(10);        sum = new TextField(20);        //  1ä¸ª  æŒ‰é’®        Button button = new Button("=");        button.addActionListener(new MyCalculatorListener());        //  1ä¸ª  æ ‡ç­¾        Label label = new Label("+");        //  å¸ƒå±€        setLayout(new FlowLayout());        add(num_1);        add(label);        add(num_2);        add(button);        add(sum);        pack();        setVisible(true);    }    //ç›‘å¬å™¨ç±»    private class MyCalculatorListener implements ActionListener{        //  è·å–ä¸‰ä¸ªå˜é‡//        Calculator calculator = null;//        public MyCalculatorListener(Calculator calculator) {//            this.calculator = calculator;//        }        @Override        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {            //  è·å–ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°            //  calculator.num_1.getText();// Stringç±»å‹            int n1 = Integer.parseInt(num_1.getText());// String è½¬ int ç±»å‹            int n2 = Integer.parseInt(num_2.getText());            //  è¿›è¡Œ+è¿ç®—ï¼Œæ”¾å…¥sumæ¡†            sum.setText(""+(n1 + n2));            //  æ¸…é™¤å‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¡†            num_1.setText("");            num_2.setText("");        }    }}

package com.shgxy.study03;import java.awt.*;public class TestPaint {    public static void main(String[] args) {        new MyPaint().loadFrame();    }}class MyPaint extends Frame{    public void loadFrame(){        setBounds(200,200,600,500);        setVisible(true);    }    @Override    public void paint(Graphics g) {        //ç”»ç¬”é¢œè‰²        g.setColor(Color.pink);        g.drawOval(200,200,100,100);        g.fillOval(0,0,100,100);        //  ç”»ç¬”ç”¨å®Œï¼Œå°†å®ƒè¿˜åŸåˆ°æœ€åˆçš„é¢œè‰²            }}

package com.shgxy.study03;        import java.awt.*;        import java.awt.event.MouseAdapter;        import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;        import java.awt.event.MouseListener;        import java.util.ArrayList;        import java.util.Iterator;//  é¼ æ ‡ç›‘å¬public class TestMouseListener {    public static void main(String[] args) {        new MyFrame("ç”»å›¾å›¾");    }}class MyFrame extends Frame{    //  ç”»ç”»éœ€è¦ç”»ç¬”ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡å½“å‰çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œéœ€è¦é›†åˆæ¥å­˜å‚¨è¿™ä¸ªç‚¹    ArrayList points;    public MyFrame(String title) {        super(title);        setBounds(200,200,400,400);        //  å­˜é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»çš„ç‚¹        points = new ArrayList<>();        //  é¼ æ ‡ç›‘å¬å™¨ï¼Œæ­£å¯¹è¯¥çª—å£        this.addMouseListener(new MyMouseListener());        setVisible(true);    }    @Override    public void paint(Graphics g) {        //ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡äº‹ä»¶        //è¿­ä»£å™¨å°†å…¶å¾ªç¯å‡ºæ¥        Iterator iterator = points.iterator();        while (iterator.hasNext()){            Point point = (Point) iterator.next();    //æŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ª            g.setColor(Color.pink);            g.fillOval(point.x,point.y,10,10);        }    }    //  æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹åˆ°ç•Œé¢ä¸Š    public void addPoint(Point point){        points.add(point);    }//    private class MYMouseListener implements MouseListener{//    } å¾ˆéº»çƒ¦    //  é€‚é…å™¨æ¨¡å¼    private class MyMouseListener extends MouseAdapter{        @Override        public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e) {            MyFrame frame = (MyFrame)e.getSource();            //    ç‚¹å‡»            frame.addPoint(new Point(e.getX(),e.getY()));            //   æ¯æ¬¡ç‚¹å‡»é¼ æ ‡éƒ½éœ€è¦é‡æ–°ç”»ä¸€é            frame.repaint();    //åˆ·æ–°        }    }}

package com.shgxy.snake;import com.shgxy.study04.ImageIconDemo1;import javax.swing.*;import java.net.URL;public class Data {    //ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„  test.png    //ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„  /   ç›¸å½“äºå½“å‰çš„é¡¹ç›®    public static URL headerURL = Data.class.getResource("statics/header.png");    public static ImageIcon header = new ImageIcon(headerURL);    public static URL upURL = Data.class.getResource("statics/up.png");    public static URL downURL = Data.class.getResource("statics/down.png");    public static URL leftURL = Data.class.getResource("statics/left.png");    public static URL rightURL = Data.class.getResource("statics/right.png");    public static ImageIcon up = new ImageIcon(upURL);    public static ImageIcon down = new ImageIcon(downURL);    public static ImageIcon left = new ImageIcon(leftURL);    public static ImageIcon right = new ImageIcon(rightURL);    public static URL bodyURL = Data.class.getResource("statics/body.png");    public static ImageIcon body = new ImageIcon(bodyURL);    public static URL foodURL = Data.class.getResource("statics/food.png");    public static ImageIcon food = new ImageIcon(foodURL);}

package com.shgxy.snake;import javax.swing.*;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;import java.awt.event.ActionListener;import java.awt.event.KeyEvent;import java.awt.event.KeyListener;import java.util.Random;public class GamePanel extends JPanel implements KeyListener, ActionListener {    //å®šä¹‰è›‡çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„    int length;    int[] snake_X = new int[600];    int[] snake_Y = new int[500];    String direction;    int score;    //æ¸¸æˆå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€ï¼šå¼€å§‹ï¼Œåœæ­¢    boolean isStart = false;    //æ¸¸æˆå¤±è´¥çŠ¶æ€    boolean isFail = false;    //foodçš„åæ ‡    int food_X;    int food_Y;    Random random = new Random();    //å®šæ—¶å™¨,100msæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡    Timer timer = new Timer(100,this);    //æ„é€ å™¨    public GamePanel(){        init();        //è·å¾—ç„¦ç‚¹å’Œé”®ç›˜äº‹ä»¶        this.setFocusable(true);//è·å–ç„¦ç‚¹äº‹ä»¶        this.addKeyListener(this);//è·å¾—é”®ç›˜ç›‘å¬äº‹ä»¶        //æ¸¸æˆä¸€å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå®šæ—¶å™¨å°±å¯åŠ¨        timer.start();    }    public void foodXY(){        food_X = 25 + 25*random.nextInt(34);        food_Y = 75 + 25*random.nextInt(24);    }    //åˆå§‹åŒ–æ–¹æ³•    public void init(){        length = 3;        snake_X[0] = 100;snake_Y[0] = 100;//è„‘è¢‹çš„åæ ‡        snake_X[1] = 75; snake_Y[1] = 100;//ç¬¬1ä¸ªèº«ä½“çš„åæ ‡        snake_X[2] = 50; snake_Y[2] = 100;//ç¬¬2ä¸ªèº«ä½“çš„åæ ‡        direction = "R";//è›‡å¤´çš„åˆå§‹æ–¹å‘        score = 0;        //é£Ÿç‰©éšæœºåˆ†å¸ƒ        foodXY();    }    //ç»˜åˆ¶é¢æ¿    @Override    protected void paintComponent(Graphics g) {        super.paintComponent(g);//æ¸…å±        this.setBackground(Color.WHITE);        Data.header.paintIcon(this,g,25,11);//å¹¿å‘Š        g.fillRect(25,75,850,600);//æ¸¸æˆç•Œé¢        //æŠŠå°è›‡ç”»ä¸Šå»        if (direction.equals("R")){            Data.right.paintIcon(this,g,snake_X[0],snake_Y[0]);        }else if(direction.equals("L")){            Data.left.paintIcon(this,g,snake_X[0],snake_Y[0]);        }else if(direction.equals("U")){            Data.up.paintIcon(this,g,snake_X[0],snake_Y[0]);        }else if(direction.equals("D")){            Data.down.paintIcon(this,g,snake_X[0],snake_Y[0]);        }        for (int i = 1; i < length; i++) {            Data.body.paintIcon(this,g,snake_X[i],snake_Y[i]);        }        //foodç»˜åˆ¶        Data.food.paintIcon(this,g,food_X,food_Y);        //æ¸¸æˆçŠ¶æ€        if (isStart == false){            g.setColor(Color.cyan);            g.setFont(new Font("å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘",Font.BOLD,40));            g.drawString("æŒ‰ä¸‹â€œç©ºæ ¼â€å¼€å§‹æ¸¸æˆ~",300,300);        }        if (isFail){            g.setColor(Color.red);            g.setFont(new Font("å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘",Font.BOLD,40));            g.drawString("å¤±è´¥å’¯ï¼Œé’æŒ‰ä¸‹â€œç©ºæ ¼â€é‡æ–°æ¥è¿‡~",200,300);        }        //ç”»ç§¯åˆ†        g.setColor(Color.pink);        g.setFont(new Font("å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘",Font.BOLD,18));        g.drawString("é•¿åº¦ï¼š"+length,750,30);        g.drawString("å¾—åˆ†ï¼š"+10*(length-3),750,55);    }    @Override    public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e) {    }    //é”®ç›˜ç›‘å¬äº‹ä»¶    @Override    public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e) {        int keyCode = e.getKeyCode();//è·å–é”®ç›˜æŒ‰é”®çš„å€¼        if (keyCode == KeyEvent.VK_SPACE){            if (isFail){                //é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹                isFail = false;                init();            }else {                //isStart = true;                isStart =! isStart;//æ¯”è¾ƒå¥½ï¼Œæœ‰åˆ©äºæ¸¸æˆæš‚åœå¼€å§‹            }            repaint();        }        //å°è›‡ç§»åŠ¨        if (keyCode == KeyEvent.VK_UP) {            direction = "U";        }else if (keyCode == KeyEvent.VK_DOWN){            direction = "D";        }else if (keyCode == KeyEvent.VK_LEFT){            direction = "L";        }else if (keyCode == KeyEvent.VK_RIGHT){            direction = "R";        }    }    @Override    public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e) {    }    //äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬ï¼Œéœ€è¦é€šè¿‡å›ºå®šäº‹ä»¶æ¥åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œ1s=10æ¬¡    @Override    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {        if (isStart && isFail == false){//æ¸¸æˆå¼€å§‹            for (int i = length - 1; i > 0; i--) {                snake_X[i] = snake_X[i-1];                snake_Y[i] = snake_Y[i-1];            }            //èµ°å‘            if (direction.equals("R")){                snake_X[0] = snake_X[0] + 25;                if (snake_X[0]>850){snake_X[0] = 25;}//è¾¹ç•Œåˆ¤æ–­            }else if (direction.equals("L")){                snake_X[0] = snake_X[0] - 25;                if (snake_X[0]<25){snake_X[0] = 850;}//è¾¹ç•Œåˆ¤æ–­            }else if (direction.equals("U")){                snake_Y[0] = snake_Y[0] - 25;                if (snake_Y[0]<75){snake_Y[0] = 650;}//è¾¹ç•Œåˆ¤æ–­            }else if (direction.equals("D")){                snake_Y[0] = snake_Y[0] + 25;                if (snake_Y[0]>650){snake_Y[0] = 75;}//è¾¹ç•Œåˆ¤æ–­            }            //åƒå®ç‰©            if (snake_X[0] == food_X && snake_Y[0] == food_Y) {                length++;                //é‡æ–°åˆ†é…é£Ÿç‰©åæ ‡                foodXY();            }            //å¤±è´¥åˆ¤å®š            for (int i = 1; i < length; i++) {                if (snake_X[0] == snake_X[i] && snake_Y[0] == snake_Y[i]) {                    isFail = true;                }            }            repaint();        }        timer.start();    }}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
